summary.span: 提供一个使您能够以可视方式设计复合活动的设计器。

span.span: Provides a designer that enables you to visually design composite activities.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 使用 以可视方式设计复合活动、自定义布局和管理 的绘制。Use the to visually design composite activities, to customize the layout, and to manage the drawing of the . 还允许您管理所包含的活动设计器的事件。The also enables you to manage events for the contained activity designers. 它还允许您自定义和管理所包含的活动设计器的位置、大小和布局。It also enables you to customize and manage the position, size, and layout of contained activity designers.

param.name: e
param.span: 包含事件数据的 。

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 指针位于设计器边界内的情况下单击鼠标时调用。

span.span: Called when the mouse is clicked when the pointer is in designer bounds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下面描述与拖放操作相关的事件的引发方式以及引发时间。The following describes how and when events related to drag-and-drop operations are raised. 如果设计器是有效的放置目标，则会引发 事件并产生指定的拖放效果。If the designer is a valid drop target, the event is raised with the drag-and-drop effect specified. 有关拖放效果的列表，请参见 枚举。For a list of drag-and-drop effects, see the enumeration. - 跟踪指针位置、键盘状态和鼠标按钮状态的更改。Changes in the pointer position, keyboard state, and mouse button state are tracked. - 如果用户将鼠标移出设计器边界，则会引发 事件。If the user moves out of the designer bounds, the event is raised. - 如果鼠标进入另一个设计器，则会引发该设计器的 。If the mouse enters another designer, the for that designer is raised. - 如果鼠标发生移动但停留在同一设计器中，则会引发 事件。If the mouse moves but stays within the same designer, the event is raised. - 如果更改了键盘或鼠标按钮状态，则引发 事件并根据事件 `Action` 的 属性值确定是否继续拖动、放置数据或取消操作。If there is a change in the keyboard or mouse state, the event is raised and determines whether to continue the drag, to drop the data, or to cancel the operation based on the value of the `Action` property of the event . 如果该值为 `DragAction.Continue`，则会引发 事件以继续操作，并引发 事件以产生新效果，从而能够设置适当的视觉反馈。If the value is `DragAction.Continue`, the event is raised to continue the operation and the event is raised with the new effect so appropriate visual feedback can be set. 有关有效放置效果的列表，请参见 枚举。For a list of valid drop effects, see the enumeration. > [!NOTE] > 和 事件成对发生，以便当鼠标移到放置目标上时，就能够为用户提供有关鼠标位置的最新反馈。The and events are paired so that as the mouse moves across the drop target, the user is supplied with the most up-to-date feedback about the mouse position. 如果该值为 `DragAction.Drop`，则会向源返回放置效果值，以便源应用程序可以对源数据执行适当的操作；例如，如果是移动操作，则会剪切数据。If the value is `DragAction.Drop`, the drop effect value is returned to the source, so that the source application can perform the appropriate operation on the source data; for example, cut the data if the operation was a move. 如果该值为 `DragAction.Cancel`，则会引发 事件。If the value is `DragAction.Cancel`, the event is raised. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/).
